evidence.claim: Trimble utilizes AWS cloud services for its software applications.
The company integrates with EHR systems using FHIR and HL7 standards.
Trimble used Microsoft Azure to enhance its data analytics capabilities.
Apache Kafka is used for real-time data integration and streaming solutions.
Trimble's cloud solutions include integration patterns allowing interoperability between systems.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence of X12 healthcare transactions or clearinghouse activities found.
